HDG.WM.content: originary anxiety usually repressed (niedergehalten), anxiety is there, is sleeping, its breath quivers perpetually through Dasein > daring ones [embrace] anxiety, sustained by that one which they expend themselves > anxiety [?] stands outside of all opposition [anxiety as indifference point?], there’s cheerfulness, gentleness, creative longing

HDG.FS.content: [Kant’s] understanding incapable of understanding how limitations at heart of reason, abolished once referred to absolute, are produced in this “abolishing” relation (“vernichtenden” Bezug): there is “appeasement (Befriedigung)”: fixities disappear, while oppositions appear in their vitality (Lebendigkeit)

HDG.FS.content: Hegel characterizes finite as fixity, to fix is to posit, posit apart, and thus in opposition > “the position individuates something posited against something else (Die Setzung vereinzelt etwas Gesetztes gegen ein Anderes” > finitude thus circumscribed by non-determination, nothingness [?]

HDG.FS.content: [indifference point?] unity of opposites as non-dichotomous, more precise than in-finite, a “positing” that is neither simple opposition or simple unity: unity that contains in itself all oppositions > Absolute is “most non-dichotomous identity”

HDG.FS.content: difficult to accomplish anew what Greeks did when they thought Being as an appearing outside concealment (phusis), still we ask: what occurs in fact of arising-into-alētheia? > the overabundance (Überfülle), the excess (Übermass) of what presences (Anwesende), thus why Thales can only look to the heavens, relation to this thrust of presence is thaumazein [wonder] [height & excess] > in extreme opposition, when astronauts landed on moon, moon as moon disappeared, only a calculable parameter (Rechnungsgrösse) for technological enterprise of humans
